name: Fear Simulator
description: Fear Simulator is a unique psychological Fear game built for VR, in which there are no ghosts or blood, but only Fear scenes (including common phobias) from deep inside people's hearts, allowing players to immerse themselves and feel the Fear!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
